title: Yet Another Directory Organizer
content: YADO is a small python script that allow the user to organize a certain (variable) directory quickly, it uses no external libraries other than Python's native.

title: Hyprland Wallpaper Suite
content: It's a Wallpaper Suite made in Lua Scripting Language, it auto-detects all the monitor of the user and prompts a solicitation in case he wants to change the wallpaper, facilitates the usage of Hyprpaper on any shell too.

title: PyWpp
content: A Lightweight Gui Hyprland Wallpaper Changer Written in Python.

title: Dotfiles
content: My personal linux configuration written in various languages.

title: PupHealth
content: Patient management application, vaccines and Veterinary report.
